Name: Island Herders
About the game: A sliding block puzzle where you must herd creatures along floating islands. It is nap time among the floating islands and the creatures need someone to navigate them to their zones. With four different types of creatures that all have their own ideas you will be challenged to get them all there at the same time. Island Herders is a single-player game with over 250 puzzles to complete. These puzzles challenge you to maneuver 1-10 different creatures at the same time. If you find some of the challenges too easy try to complete them faster than the turn goals!
